website_summaries.verdict: A soothing overnight mask that helps hydrate and improve the appearance of dry, flaking skin.
pros: Hydrates your skin without leaving it greasy
Helps tone skin and reduce the appearance of fine lines
cons: A few users have said this mask felt too heavy on their skin

customer_reviews.title: Not happy about this
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little bit thinner than the sample I had received from a local store. So I looked up the expiration. This product was made TWO years ago. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: fossil girl

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The claim is you'll wake up with more hydrated, dewy soft skin. I've used this for over a month and haven't noticed a single improvement. My skin isn't softer or more hydrated. The texture is still the same. My skin is normal, not dry. I was really wanting a deep moisture mask and this is not it. It might work for you but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeW

customer_reviews.title: i have combination skin and are prone to breakouts. ...
customer_reviews.text: i have combination skin and are prone to breakouts. i use acne medication which can really dry out portions of my skin. i additionally live in a cold, dry climate. i use this every night and my skin is never dry!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lozano

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i’m pickyvsbout moisturizer and this stuff will s great, not greasy but really nice feel. i actually use in the am but i love a good amount of moisturizer to start the day
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I adore the moisture surge intense lotion and hoped the mask would be even better. Sadly I think it provides less moisturizing to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cindarelli

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good moisturizer. It's a bit pricey, but if you have dry skin...this is for you. There's a lot in the tube so, it will last a while. I would recommend this. Even people with skin problems such as Eczema can use this. It's not something I use every night, but when I do have a dry skin concern this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: HappyParrot

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only lotion I use on my face! It feels moisturized all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Cowden

customer_reviews.title: No box or seal around product
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold through HQ Wearhouse. It arrived with no box and no seal. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Meza

customer_reviews.title: Iconic Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best product from Clinique. I love it so much. Especially if you live in cold places it l keep your skin moisturizer for the entire day by one time application 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Lavenya

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: So the package was a little sketchy, and didn’t look like the real deal initially but I’ve been using it daily and seems to be the same.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Works for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: The only lotion that will work for my dry skin! This is my third bottle and I don’t know what I’d do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moisture protector day and night
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it makes my complexion look in the morning when I wake up; also great as a foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Yapundich

customer_reviews.title: Very hydrating
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely dry skin and woke up to a moisturized soft skin 😍
customer_reviews.author: Lamees Nada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will recommend this product for anyone who has sensitive skin like myself love this
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy and creamy to apply!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Moisturizes beautifully and I can see in 1 month the difference facially.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN Krammes

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I have EXTREMELY dry skin! My skin soaked this stuff in and stayed soft throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: K M.

customer_reviews.title: Brand name, size of item, cost
customer_reviews.text: It is a standard for use, and needed a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rauchenstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that it doesn’t make my skin feel greasy or heavy!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer! I have combination to oily skin so I only use it on my forehead, around my eyes and neck but I haven't noticed any breakouts because of it. Even my husband commented that my skin looked great after about a week of using it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: CDansby

customer_reviews.title: I am 30 but have very dry skin, especially ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 30 but have very dry skin, especially for makeup application. I use this as a daily moisturizer and it keeps my skin looking soft all day. Other moisturizers wear off and my skin starts looking dry under makeup halfway through the day. I have previously used the Clinique moisture surge moisturizer and this is a step up if you need more moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Connole

customer_reviews.title: This is a staple for any facial regimen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic night cream that I'd wish I'd found a lot sooner. For years, I've trialed many, many night creams and this one surpasses all! I have sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts. After one use, I woke up to dramatically nourished skin that was soft and supple. After a week's use, my skin continues to be soft and supple! This mask delivers moisture without damaging your skin's natural barriers. I have not broken out from this mask which by comparison of other products, makes this product valuable to me. This is a staple for any facial regimen.
customer_reviews.author: shesonit

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing, but makes me break out
customer_reviews.text: I usually use Burt’s Bees Intense Hydration mask, but in the dry winter air that wasn’t enough. So I tried this mask, and it definitely hydrates more. However, every time I use it, I break out within the next day or two. Since I haven’t had a zit in 10 years, thats not ok, and quenching my skin isn’t worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works miracles. I have dry, flaky skin on my face and I've been trying to get a hold on it for four years now, with many different lotions and creams. It's FINALLY gone as long as I remember to apply every day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Behm

customer_reviews.title: Face scrub
customer_reviews.text: I love these products, they make my skin look good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have very dry skin so this really works well for me! I use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Goff

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: The only things that will moisturize my skin in the dry winters without making me breakout. I also use a retin-a for acne and this is gentle and doesnt sting. it makes my face so soft (but not greasy) and prevents flaking. LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.P.

customer_reviews.title: Also really useful during chemotherapy for ultra dry
customer_reviews.text: A winter must-have. Also really useful during chemotherapy for ultra dry, flakey skin.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mcwatters

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Moisture Surge Overnight Mask - great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I started using Clinique Moisture Surge Overnight Mask after I'd been using a topical medication which was very drying to my skin. It has moisturized my skin and it feels much softer. I will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still Using It
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this absorbs and feels but I am not sure I am seeing any "results" from it but I have been a little inconsistent about using it every night so will try to be better and add to the review later.
customer_reviews.author: Rise J. Putzke

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: Love this creame,it is not heavy or greasy. I wash my face and put on a hydrating serum and then this creame. It doesn't leave any residue on you pillow and in the morning my face is really soft and smooth. It seems to help with blotchiness too.
customer_reviews.author: RGORDY

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It really helps my skin to be more moist and not as dry. I can see the difference it makes. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Hunt

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this is a great moisturizer and amazon has a good price
customer_reviews.author: savtanee

product_meta.title: Clinique Moisture Surge Overnight Mask for All Skin Types, 3.4 Ounce
product_meta.description: Creamy, penetrating night mask helps skin drink deep to replenish lost moisture, build reserves for tomorrow. All night long, it soothes and nourishes to help skin hold in moisture. You wake and touch soft, dewy, glowing skin. Oil-free.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
